name: Slay The Dragon
description: Slay the dragon is a turn based roguelike RPG game, where you must kill the dragon.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Processor: 800 MHz Intel Core M-5Y10 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5300 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 Storage: 100 MB available space
